title: Fiat maps out another French road trip
text:
John Elkann is clearly a man who isn’t afraid of potholes. Or perhaps the Italian is just a secret Francophile.

Having tried and failed to pull off a hugely-complicated merger with Renault earlier this year, the scion of Fiat’s founding Agnelli family has dusted himself down and is now trying to hop into bed with France’s other big carmaker Peugeot, which owns the Vauxhall brand in the UK.

In some ways it’s a more compelling tie-up. Both are sub-scale compared to the industry’s other big names Volkswagen and Toyota, and size is going to become increasingly important as the race towards electrification intensifies.

The car industry has been painfully slow to wake up to the drive for more energy...
description: John Elkann is clearly a man who isn’t afraid of potholes.
